Package.Name: MIMS.me.built.6.0
Package.Description: Use for environmental and metagenome sequences. Organism must be a metagenome, where lineage starts with unclassified sequences and scientific name ends with 'metagenome'.
Package.TemplateHeader: # This is a submission template for batch deposit of 'MIMS: metagenome/environmental, built; version 6.0' samples to the NCBI BioSample database (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/biosample/). # Fields with an asterisk (*) are mandatory. Your submission will fail if any mandatory fields are not completed. If information is unavailable for any mandatory field, please enter 'not collected', 'not applicable' or 'missing' as appropriate. # All other fields are optional. Leave optional fields empty if no information is available. # You can add any number of custom fields to fully describe your BioSamples, simply include them in the table. # CAUTION: Be aware that Excel may automatically apply formatting to your data. In particular, take care with dates, incrementing autofills and special characters like / or -. Doublecheck that your text file is accurate before uploading to BioSample. # TO MAKE A SUBMISSION: # 1. Complete the template table (typically in Excel, or another spreadsheet application) # 2. Save the worksheet as a Text (Tab-delimited) file - use 'File, Save as, Save as type: Text (Tab-delimited)' # 3. Upload the file on the 'Attributes' tab of the BioSample Submission Portal at https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/subs/biosample/. # 4. If you have any questions, please contact us at biosamplehelp@ncbi.nlm.nih.gov.

Attribute.Name: absolute air humidity
Attribute.Description: actual mass of water vapor - mh20 - present in the air water vapor mixture

Attribute.Name: air temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature of the air at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: building occupancy type
Attribute.Description: primary function for which a building or discrete part of a building is intended to be used

Format.Description: office | market | restaurant | residence | school | residential | commercial | low rise | high rise | wood framed | health care | airport | sports complex | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: building setting
Attribute.Description: location (geography) where a building is set

Format.Description: urban | suburban | exurban | rural | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: carbon dioxide
Attribute.Description: carbon dioxide (gas) amount or concentration at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: collection date
Attribute.Description: the date on which the sample was collected; date/time ranges are supported by providing two dates from among the supported value formats, delimited by a forward-slash character; collection times are supported by adding "T", then the hour and minute after the date, and must be in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), otherwise known as "Zulu Time" (Z); supported formats include "DD-Mmm-YYYY", "Mmm-YYYY", "YYYY" or ISO 8601 standard "YYYY-mm-dd", "YYYY-mm", "YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ss"; e.g., 30-Oct-1990, Oct-1990, 1990, 1990-10-30, 1990-10, 21-Oct-1952/15-Feb-1953, 2015-10-11T17:53:03Z; valid non-ISO dates will be automatically transformed to ISO format

Attribute.Name: broad-scale environmental context
Attribute.Description: Add terms that identify the major environment type(s) where your sample was collected. Recommend subclasses of biome [ENVO:00000428]. Multiple terms can be separated by one or more pipes e.g.: Â mangrove biome [ENVO:01000181]|estuarine biome [ENVO:01000020]

Attribute.Name: local-scale environmental context
Attribute.Description: Add terms that identify environmental entities having causal influences upon the entity at time of sampling, multiple terms can be separated by pipes, e.g.: Â shoreline [ENVO:00000486]|intertidal zone [ENVO:00000316]

Attribute.Name: environmental medium
Attribute.Description: Add terms that identify the material displaced by the entity at time of sampling. Recommend subclasses of environmental material [ENVO:00010483]. Multiple terms can be separated by pipes e.g.: estuarine water [ENVO:01000301]|estuarine mud [ENVO:00002160]

Attribute.Name: filter type
Attribute.Description: device which removes solid particulates or airborne molecular contaminants

Format.Description: particulate air filter | chemical air filter | low-MERV pleated media | HEPA | electrostatic | gas-phase or ultraviolet air treatments | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: geographic location
Attribute.Description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from this list http://www.insdc.org/documents/country-qualifier-vocabulary. Use a colon to separate the country or ocean from more detailed information about the location, eg "Canada: Vancouver" or "Germany: halfway down Zugspitze, Alps"

Attribute.Name: heating and cooling system type
Attribute.Description: methods of conditioning or heating a room or building

Format.Description: radiant system | heat pump | forced air system | steam forced heat | wood stove | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: indoor space
Attribute.Description: a distinguishable space within a structure, the purpose for which discrete areas of a building is used

Format.Description: bedroom | office | bathroom | foyer | kitchen | locker room | hallway | elevator | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 38.98 N 77.11 W

Attribute.Name: light type
Attribute.Description: application of light to achieve some practical or aesthetic effect. Lighting includes the use of both artificial light sources such as lamps and light fixtures, as well as natural illumination by capturing daylight. Can also include absence of light

Format.Description: natural light | electric light | no light | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: occupancy at sampling
Attribute.Description: number of occupants present at time of sample within the given space

Attribute.Name: occupant density at sampling
Attribute.Description: average number of occupants at time of sampling per square footage

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample,should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: relative air humidity
Attribute.Description: partial vapor and air pressure, density of the vapor and air, or by the actual mass of the vapor and air

Attribute.Name: space typical state
Attribute.Description: customary or normal state of the space

Format.Description: typical occupied | typically unoccupied | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: typical occupant density
Attribute.Description: customary or normal density of occupants

Attribute.Name: ventilation type
Attribute.Description: ventilation system used in the sampled premises

Attribute.Name: address
Attribute.Description: The street name and building number where the sampling occurred

Attribute.Name: adjacent rooms
Attribute.Description: List of rooms (room number, room name) immediately adjacent to the sampling room

Attribute.Name: aerospace structure
Attribute.Description: Aerospace structures typically consist of thin plates with stiffeners for the external surfaces, bulkheads and frames to support the shape and fasteners such as welds, rivets, screws and bolts to hold the components together, e.g., plane, glider

Attribute.Name: amount of light
Attribute.Description: The unit of illuminance and luminous emittance, measuring luminous flux per unit area

Attribute.Name: architectural structure
Attribute.Description: An architectural structure is a human-made, free-standing, immobile outdoor construction, e.g., building, shed, home

Attribute.Name: average dew point
Attribute.Description: The average of dew point measures taken at the beginning of every hour over a 24 hour period on the sampling day

Attribute.Name: average daily occupancy
Attribute.Description: Daily average occupancy of room. Indicate the number of person(s) daily occupying the sampling room

Attribute.Name: average temperature
Attribute.Description: The average of temperatures taken at the beginning of every hour over a 24 hour period on the sampling day

Attribute.Name: bathroom count
Attribute.Description: The number of bathrooms in the building

Attribute.Name: bedroom count
Attribute.Description: The number of bedrooms in the building

Attribute.Name: design, construction, and operation documents
Attribute.Description: The building design, construction and operation documents, e.g., building information model, commissioning report, complaint logs, contract administration, cost estimate, janitorial schedules or logs, maintenance plans, schedule, sections, shop drawings, submittals, ventilation system, windows

Attribute.Name: built structure age
Attribute.Description: The age of the built structure since construction

Attribute.Name: built structure setting
Attribute.Description: The characterization of the location of the built structure as high or low human density, e.g., urban, rural

Attribute.Name: built structure type
Attribute.Description: A physical structure that is a body or assemblage of bodies in space to form a system capable of supporting loads

Attribute.Name: ceiling area
Attribute.Description: The area of the ceiling space within the room

Attribute.Name: ceiling condition
Attribute.Description: The physical condition of the ceiling at the time of sampling, e.g., new, visible wear, needs repair, damaged, rupture

Attribute.Name: ceiling finish material
Attribute.Description: The type of material used to finish a ceiling, e.g., drywall, mineral fibre, tiles, PVC, plasterboard, metal, fiberglass, stucco, mineral wool/calcium silicate, wood

Attribute.Name: ceiling structure
Attribute.Description: The construction format of the ceiling, e.g., wood frame, concrete

Attribute.Name: ceiling texture
Attribute.Description: The feel, appearance, or consistency of a ceiling surface, e.g., crows feet, crows-foot stomp, double skip, hawk and trowel, knockdown, popcorn, orange peel, rosebud stomp, Santa-Fe texture, skip trowel, smooth, stomp knockdown, swirl

Attribute.Name: ceiling thermal mass
Attribute.Description: The ability of the ceiling to provide inertia against temperature fluctuations. Generally this means concrete that is exposed. A metal deck that supports a concrete slab will act thermally as long as it is exposed to room air flow

Attribute.Name: ceiling type
Attribute.Description: The type of ceiling according to the ceiling's appearance or construction, e.g., cathedral, dropped, concave, barrel-shaped, coffered, cove, stretched

Attribute.Name: ceiling signs of water/mold
Attribute.Description: Signs of the presence of mold or mildew on the ceiling, e.g., presence of mold visible, no presence of mold visible

Attribute.Name: collection method
Attribute.Description: Process used to collect the sample, e.g., bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL)

Attribute.Name: cooling system identifier
Attribute.Description: The cooling system identifier

Attribute.Name: date last rain
Attribute.Description: The date of the last time it rained

Attribute.Name: dew point
Attribute.Description: temperature to which a given parcel of humid air must be cooled, at constant barometric pressure, for water vapor to condense into water.

Attribute.Name: door type, composite
Attribute.Description: The composite type of the door, e.g., metal covered, revolving, sliding, telescopic

Attribute.Name: door condition
Attribute.Description: The physical condition of the door, e.g., damaged, needs repair, new, rupture, visible wear

Attribute.Name: door direction of opening
Attribute.Description: The direction the door opens, e.g., inward, outward, sideways

Attribute.Name: door location
Attribute.Description: The relative location of the door in the room, e.g., north, south, east, west

Attribute.Name: door material
Attribute.Description: The material the door is composed of, e.g., aluminum, cellular PVC, engineered plastic, fiberboard, fiberglass, metal, thermoplastic alloy, vinyl, wood, wood/plastic composite

Attribute.Name: door movement
Attribute.Description: The type of movement of the door, e.g., collapsible, folding, revolving, rolling shutter, sliding, swinging

Attribute.Name: door area or size
Attribute.Description: The size of the door

Attribute.Name: door type
Attribute.Description: The type of door material, e.g., composite, metal, wooden

Attribute.Name: door type, metal
Attribute.Description: The type of metal door, e.g., collapsible, corrugated steel, hollow, rolling shutters, steel plate

Attribute.Name: door type, wood
Attribute.Description: The type of wood door, e.g., bettened and ledged, battened, ledged and braced, battened, ledged and framed, battened, ledged, braced and frame, framed and paneled, glashed or sash, flush, louvered, wire gauged

Attribute.Name: door signs of water/mold
Attribute.Description: Signs of the presence of mold or mildew on a door, e.g., presence of mold visible, no presence of mold visible

Attribute.Name: drawings
Attribute.Description: The buildings architectural drawings, e.g., operation, as built, construction, bid, design, building navigation map, diagram, sketch

Attribute.Name: elevator count
Attribute.Description: The number of elevators within the built structure

Attribute.Name: escalator count
Attribute.Description: The number of escalators within the built structure

Attribute.Name: exposed ductwork
Attribute.Description: The amount of exposed ductwork in the room

Attribute.Name: exposed pipes
Attribute.Description: The number of exposed pipes in the room

Attribute.Name: exterior door count
Attribute.Description: The number of exterior doors in the built structure

Attribute.Name: orientations of exterior wall
Attribute.Description: The orientation of the exterior wall, e.g., north, south, east, west, northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest

Attribute.Name: orientations of exterior window
Attribute.Description: The compass direction the exterior window of the room is facing, e.g., north, south, east, west, northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest

Attribute.Name: fireplace type
Attribute.Description: A firebox with chimney, e.g., gas burning, wood burning

Attribute.Name: floor age
Attribute.Description: The time period since installment of the carpet or flooring

Attribute.Name: floor area
Attribute.Description: The area of the floor space within the room

Attribute.Name: floor condition
Attribute.Description: The physical condition of the floor at the time of sampling, e.g., new, visible wear, needs repair, damaged, rupture

Attribute.Name: floor count
Attribute.Description: The number of floors in the building, including basements and mechanical penthouse

Attribute.Name: floor finish material
Attribute.Description: The floor covering type; the finished surface that is walked on, e.g., tile, wood strip or parquet, carpet, rug, laminate wood, lineoleum, vinyl composition tile, sheet vinyl, stone, bamboo, cork, terrazo, concrete, none;specify unfinished, sealed, clear finish, paint

Attribute.Name: floor structure
Attribute.Description: Refers to the structural elements and subfloor upon which the finish flooring is installed, e.g., balcony, floating floor, glass floor, raised floor, sprung floor, wood-framed, concrete

Attribute.Name: floor thermal mass
Attribute.Description: The ability of the floor to provide inertia against temperature fluctuations

Attribute.Name: floor signs of water/mold
Attribute.Description: Signs of the presence of mold or mildew in a room, e.g., mold odor, wet floor, water stains, wall discoloration, floor discoloration, ceiling discoloration, peeling paint or wallpaper, bulging walls, condensation

Attribute.Name: frequency of cleaning
Attribute.Description: The number of times the sample location is cleaned, e.g., daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, annually

Attribute.Name: frequency of cooking
Attribute.Description: The number of times a meal is cooked per week

Attribute.Name: furniture
Attribute.Description: The types of furniture present in the sampled room, e.g., cabinet, chair, desks

Attribute.Name: gender of restroom
Attribute.Description: The gender type of the restroom, e.g., all gender, female, gender neutral, male, male and female, unisex

Attribute.Name: hallway/corridor count
Attribute.Description: The total count of hallways and cooridors in the built structure

Attribute.Name: handidness
Attribute.Description: The handidness of the individual sampled, e.g., ambidexterity, left handedness, mixed-handedness, right handedness

Attribute.Name: heating delivery locations
Attribute.Description: The location of heat delivery within the room, e.g., north, south, east, west

Attribute.Name: heating system delivery method
Attribute.Description: The method by which the heat is delivered through the system, e.g., conductive, radiant

Attribute.Name: heating system identifier
Attribute.Description: The heating system identifier

Attribute.Name: height carpet fiber mat
Attribute.Description: The average carpet fiber height in the indoor environment

Attribute.Name: indoor surface
Attribute.Description: type of indoor surface

Format.Description: counter top | window | wall | cabinet | ceiling | door | shelving | vent cover | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: inside lux light
Attribute.Description: The recorded value at sampling time (power density)

Attribute.Name: interior wall condition
Attribute.Description: The physical condition of the wall at the time of sampling, e.g., new, visible wear, needs repair, damaged, rupture

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.

Attribute.Name: last time swept/mopped/vacuumed
Attribute.Description: The last time the floor was cleaned (swept, mopped, vacuumed)

Attribute.Name: maximum occupancy
Attribute.Description: The maximum amount of people allowed in the indoor environment

Attribute.Name: mechanical structure
Attribute.Description: Mechanical structure: a moving structure, e.g., subway, coach, carriage, elevator, escalator, boat, train, car, bus

Attribute.Name: negative control type
Attribute.Description: The substance or equipment used as a negative control in an investigation, e.g., distilled water, phosphate buffer, empty collection device, empty collection tube, DNA-free PCR mix, sterile swab, sterile syringe

Attribute.Name: number of pets
Attribute.Description: The number of pets residing in the sampled space

Attribute.Name: number of houseplants
Attribute.Description: The number of plant(s) in the sampling space

Attribute.Name: number of residents
Attribute.Description: The number of individuals currently occupying in the sampling location

Attribute.Name: occupancy documentation
Attribute.Description: The type of documentation of occupancy, e.g., automated count, estimate, manual count, videos

Attribute.Name: Omics Observatory ID
Attribute.Description: A unique identifier of the omics-enabled observatory (or comparable time series) your data derives from. This identifier should be provided by the OMICON ontology; if you require a new identifier for your time series, contact the ontology's developers. Information is available here:Â https://github.com/GLOMICON/omicon. This field is only applicable to records which derive from an omics time-series or observatory.

Attribute.Name: positive control type
Attribute.Description: The substance, mixture, product, or apparatus used to verify that a process which is part of an investigation delivers a true positive

Attribute.Name: presence of pets, animals, or insects
Attribute.Description: The type and number of animals or insects present in the sampling space, e.g., cat 10, dog 2, rodent 100, snake 1

Attribute.Name: quadrant position
Attribute.Description: The quadrant position of the sampling room within the building, e.g., north side, west side, south side, east side

Attribute.Name: reference for biomaterial
Attribute.Description: Primary publication or genome report

Attribute.Name: outside relative humidity
Attribute.Description: The recorded outside relative humidity value at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: relative sampling location
Attribute.Description: The sampling location within the train car, e.g., edge of car, center of car, under a seat

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Is this organism an aerobe, anaerobe? Please note that aerobic and anaerobic are valid descriptors for microbial environments, eg, aerobe, anaerobe, facultative, microaerophilic, microanaerobe, obligate aerobe, obligate anaerobe, missing, not applicable, not collected, not provided, restricted access

Format.Description: aerobe | anaerobe | facultative | microaerophilic | microanaerobe | obligate aerobe | obligate anaerobe | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: room air exchange rate
Attribute.Description: The rate at which outside air replaces indoor air in a given space

Attribute.Name: room architectural elements
Attribute.Description: The unique details and component parts that, together, form the architecture of a distinguisahable space within a built structure

Attribute.Name: room condition
Attribute.Description: The condition of the room at the time of sampling, e.g., new, visible wear, needs repair, damaged, rupture, visible signs of mold/mildew

Attribute.Name: rooms connected by a doorway
Attribute.Description: List of rooms connected to the sampling room by a doorway, e.g., attic, bathroom, closet, conference room, elevator, examining room, hallway, kitchen, mail room, office, stairwell

Attribute.Name: room count
Attribute.Description: The total count of rooms in the built structure including all room types

Attribute.Name: room dimensions
Attribute.Description: The length, width and height of sampling room

Attribute.Name: room door distance
Attribute.Description: Distance between doors (meters) in the hallway between the sampling room and adjacent rooms

Attribute.Name: rooms that share a door with sampling room
Attribute.Description: List of room(s) (room number, room name) sharing a door with the sampling room

Attribute.Name: rooms that are on the same hallway
Attribute.Description: List of room(s) (room number, room name) located in the same hallway as sampling room

Attribute.Name: room location in building
Attribute.Description: The position of the room within the building, e.g., corner room, interior room, exterior wall

Attribute.Name: room moisture damage or mold history
Attribute.Description: The history of moisture damage or mold in the past 12 months. Number of events of moisture damage or mold observed

Attribute.Name: room net area
Attribute.Description: The net floor area of sampling room. Net area excludes wall thicknesses

Attribute.Name: room occupancy
Attribute.Description: Count of room occupancy at time of sampling

Attribute.Name: room sampling position
Attribute.Description: The horizontal sampling position in the room relative to architectural elements, e.g., north corner, south corner, west corner, east corner, northeast corner, northwest corner, southeast corner, southwest corner, center

Attribute.Name: room type
Attribute.Description: The main purpose or activity of the sampling room. A room is any distinguishable space within a structure, e.g., attic, bathroom, closet, conference room, elevator, examining room, hallway, kitchen, mail room, private office, open office, stairwell,restroom, lobby, vestibule, mechanical or electrical room, data center, laboratory_wet, laboratory_dry, gymnasium, natatorium, auditorium, lockers, cafe, warehouse

Attribute.Name: room volume
Attribute.Description: Volume of sampling room

Attribute.Name: rooms that share a wall with sampling room
Attribute.Description: List of room(s) (room number, room name) sharing a wall with the sampling room

Attribute.Name: room window count
Attribute.Description: Number of windows in the room

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sampling floor
Attribute.Description: The floor of the building, where the sampling room is located, e.g., 1st floor, 2nd floor, basement, lobby

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sampling room ID or name
Attribute.Description: Sampling room number. This ID should be consistent with the designations on the building floor plans

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample size sorting method
Attribute.Description: method by which samples are sorted

Attribute.Name: sampling time outside
Attribute.Description: The recent and long term history of outside sampling

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: sampling day weather
Attribute.Description: The weather on the sampling day, e.g., clear sky, cloudy, foggy, hail, rain, snow, sleet, sunny, windy

Attribute.Name: season
Attribute.Description: The season when sampling occurred. Any of the four periods into which the year is divided by the equinoxes and solstices. This field accepts terms listed under season (http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/NCIT_C94729)

Attribute.Name: seasonal use
Attribute.Description: The seasons the space is occupied, e.g., spring, summer, fall, winter

Attribute.Name: shading device signs of water/mold
Attribute.Description: Signs of the presence of mold or mildew on the shading device, e.g., presence of mold visible, no presence of mold visible

Attribute.Name: shading device condition
Attribute.Description: The physical condition of the shading device at the time of sampling, e.g., damaged, needs repair, new, rupture, visible wear

Attribute.Name: shading device location
Attribute.Description: The location of the shading device in relation to the built structure, e.g., exterior, interior

Attribute.Name: shading device material
Attribute.Description: The material the shading device is composed of

Attribute.Name: shading device type
Attribute.Description: The type of shading device, e.g., bahama shutters, exterior roll blind, gambrel awning, hood awning, porchroller awning, sarasota shutters, slatted aluminum, solid aluminum awning, sun screen, tree, trellis, venetian awning

Attribute.Name: size fraction selected
Attribute.Description: Filtering pore size used in sample preparation, e.g., 0-0.22 micrometer

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.

Attribute.Name: specifications
Attribute.Description: The building specifications, e.g., operation, as built, construction, bid, design, photos

Attribute.Name: specific humidity
Attribute.Description: The mass of water vapour in a unit mass of moist air, usually expressed as grams of vapour per kilogram of air, or, in air conditioning, as grains per pound

Attribute.Name: substructure type
Attribute.Description: substructure or under building is that largely hidden section of the building which is built off the foundations to the ground floor level

Attribute.Name: surface-air contaminant
Attribute.Description: contaminant identified on surface

Format.Description: dust | organic matter | particulate matter | volatile organic compounds | biological contaminants | radon | nutrients | biocides

Attribute.Name: surface humidity
Attribute.Description: surfaces: water activity as a function of air and material moisture

Attribute.Name: surface material
Attribute.Description: surface materials at the point of sampling

Format.Description: concrete | wood | stone | tile | plastic | glass | vinyl | metal | carpet | stainless steel | paint | cinder blocks | hay bales | stucco | adobe | missing | not applicable | not collected | not provided | restricted access

Attribute.Name: surface moisture
Attribute.Description: water held on a surface

Attribute.Name: surface moisture pH
Attribute.Description: pH measurement of surface

Attribute.Name: surface temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature of the surface at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: temperature outside house
Attribute.Description: The recorded temperature value at sampling time outside

Attribute.Name: train line
Attribute.Description: The subway line name, e.g., red, green, orange

Attribute.Name: train station collection location
Attribute.Description: The train station collection location, e.g., south station above ground, south station underground, south station amtrak, forest hills, riverside

Attribute.Name: train stop collection location
Attribute.Description: The train stop collection location, e.g., end, mid, downtown

Attribute.Name: visual media
Attribute.Description: The building visual media, e.g., photos, videos, commonly of the building, site context (adjacent buildings, vegetation, terrain, streets), interiors, equipment, 3D scans

Attribute.Name: wall area
Attribute.Description: The total area of the sampled room's walls

Attribute.Name: wall construction type
Attribute.Description: The building class of the wall defined by the composition of the building elements and fire-resistance rating, e.g., frame construction, joisted masonry, light noncombustible, masonry noncombustible, modified fire resistive, fire resistive

Attribute.Name: wall finish material
Attribute.Description: The material utilized to finish the outer most layer of the wall, e.g., plaster, gypsum plaster, veneer plaster, gypsum board, tile, terrazzo, stone facing, acoustical treatment, wood, metal, masonry

Attribute.Name: wall height
Attribute.Description: The average height of the walls in the sampled room

Attribute.Name: wall location
Attribute.Description: The relative location of the wall within the room, e.g., north, south, east, west

Attribute.Name: wall surface treatment
Attribute.Description: The surface treatment of interior wall, e.g., painted, wall paper, no treatment, paneling, stucco, fabric

Attribute.Name: wall texture
Attribute.Description: The feel, appearance, or consistency of a wall surface, e.g., crows feet, crows-foot stomp, double skip, hawk and trowel, knockdown, popcorn, orange peel, rosebud stomp, Santa-Fe texture, skip trowel, smooth, stomp knockdown, swirl

Attribute.Name: wall thermal mass
Attribute.Description: The ability of the wall to provide inertia against temperature fluctuations. Generally this means concrete or concrete block that is either exposed or covered only with paint

Attribute.Name: wall signs of water/mold
Attribute.Description: Signs of the presence of mold or mildew on a wall, e.g., presence of mold visible, no presence of mold visible

Attribute.Name: water feature size
Attribute.Description: The size of the water feature

Attribute.Name: water feature type
Attribute.Description: The type of water feature present within the building being sampled, e.g., fountain, pool, standing feature, stream, waterfall

Attribute.Name: weekday
Attribute.Description: The day of the week when sampling occurred, e.g., monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday

Attribute.Name: window condition
Attribute.Description: The physical condition of the window at the time of sampling, e.g., damaged, needs repair, new, rupture, visible wear

Attribute.Name: window covering
Attribute.Description: The type of window covering, e.g., blinds, curtains, none

Attribute.Name: window horizontal position
Attribute.Description: The horizontal position of the window on the wall, e.g., left, middle, right

Attribute.Name: window location
Attribute.Description: The relative location of the window within the room, e.g., north, south, east, west

Attribute.Name: window material
Attribute.Description: The type of material used to finish a window, e.g., clad, fiberglass, metal, vinyl, wood

Attribute.Name: window open frequency
Attribute.Description: The number of times windows are opened per week

Attribute.Name: window area/size
Attribute.Description: The window's length and width

Attribute.Name: window status
Attribute.Description: Defines whether the windows were open or closed during environmental testing, e.g., closed, open

Attribute.Name: window type
Attribute.Description: The type of windows, e.g., single-hung sash window, horizontal sash window, fixed window

Attribute.Name: window vertical position
Attribute.Description: The vertical position of the window on the wall, e.g., bottom, middle, top, low, middle, high

Attribute.Name: window signs of water/mold
Attribute.Description: Signs of the presence of mold or mildew on the window, e.g., presence of mold visible, no presence of mold visible
